item.title: HobbyNotebook / Shame Golf (+77)
item.description: Miniature Shame Golf is a game of painting your miniatures.

item.title: Hobby
item.description: I paint small plastic monsters and soldiers for fun. Painting Shame Golf Finished Models (and sometimes food) I’m posting a well-done photo of a finished mini/batch every friday. Listings Special Games Workshop models Mortal Realms Magazine Contents Lore and Rules Imperium Magazine Contents Lore and Rules 3D Printing Notes I use a specific Instagram tag for the finished ones. I started calling them “band shots” since it was usually a group who had been painted at once all posed together.
